Package fr.cnrs.iees.rvgrid.statemachine

Class StateMachineController

java.lang.Object
fr.cnrs.iees.rvgrid.rendezvous.AbstractGridNode
fr.cnrs.iees.rvgrid.statemachine.StateMachineController
All Implemented Interfaces:
Observer, GridNode, StateMachineObserver
public class StateMachineController extends AbstractGridNode implements StateMachineObserver
A class able to understand a state machine and send it relevant messages. This class will control a StateMachineEngine instance.
Author:
Jacques Gignoux - 16 ao√ªt 2019
